item.title: Building Chroma, my 2nd app!!
item.description: Coming Soon! Writing’s hard work! I haven’t gotten to finishing writing on some of the very interesting stuff that went down during the development for Chroma, but when I do, it’ll be here.

item.title: An OpenWeather client, my second package!
item.description: Re-Inventing The Wheel There’s a saying well known by most programmers: “Don’t reinvent the wheel’.

item.title: Caelum: Beautiful Weather
item.description: Before Before we begin with this winding tale, you can experience Caelum right now by yourselves, here for iOS, and here for Android.

item.title: Caelum's website!
item.description: Coming Soon! Writing’s hard! I haven’t gotten to finishing writing on some of the very interesting stuff that I coded up during the development for this site, such as the cool accordion styled menu I used, the unconventional warping text animations, the typography and so much more, all of which you can check out here!

item.title: My first Flutter package!!
item.description: The Inspiration The internet is a big place, and getting bigger everyday.

item.title: This Website, V:1.0.0!
item.description: This Website! Yes, this website!. Built using HTML, Javascript and CSS (along with libraries to ease the pain of boilerplate code) , with Hugo as the CMS and Forestry mixed in for a little GUI convenience, this is my little space on the internet.

item.title: My First Minecraft Mod!
item.description: The Beginning Ahh, my first coding project. Minecraft is something that I’ve loved all my life, the joy, the freedom, the boundless possibilities spreading out before you every time you open a world….
